name: choir-hub
description: Choir Hub - A project aimed to simplify the communication within CSK

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.type-check: cd server && npm run type-check && cd ../client && npm run type-check
scripts.docker:restart: cd server && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
